channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report X-2023060801
item.description:
Report X-2023060801

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-14
  • City: LONDONDERRY
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT HAD FROST FORMING ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE BOX AND MADE THE SOUND OF DRY ICE ROLLING AROUND INSIDE THE PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY THREE POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING FOOD. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 92AY99, SHERPA FOODS LLC, 33 VALLEY RIDGE RD., SOUTH BURLINGTON VT 05403.
